statements: DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 54321 AND transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE customer_id = 100 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM fraud_detection WHERE is_fraudulent = TRUE AND transaction_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM suspicious_users WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
DELETE FROM fraudulent_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_date >= '2022-06-01' AND description LIKE '%fraud%';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'refund' AND amount < 0;
